name: Translation Source
tag_list: houston-translation, translation-services, language, technical-translation, document-translation, project-staffing, multilingual-consulting, on-site-interpreting, telephonic-interpreting, video-interpretation, asia, brazil, brazilian-translations, camilo-
overview:
Translation Source provides industry leading multilingual solutions in all languages. Over the years, we have helped over 500 companies grow revenue, achieve a greater return on investment, and increased efficiencies through the proper localization/translation of their content. Our integrated team of professional industry consultants, project managers, technical specialists, and linguists help companies to develop an industry-leading solution that is customized to their specific needs.

Our services include: Document Translation, Project Staffing, Multilingual Consulting, On-site Interpreting, Telephonic Interpreting, Video Interpretation, Website Localization, Multilingual Typesetting and Graphics, Language Training, Additional Multilingual Services.
